title: ‘Is This Thing On’ Submits in Drama Categories at Golden Globes as Will Arnett and Laura Dern Seek Lead Acting Consideration (EXCLUSIVE)
summary: “Is This Thing On” may be about a stand-up comic, but it’s no laughing matter when it comes to awards. Searchlight Pictures has confirmed exclusively to Variety that Bradley Cooper’s latest film, “Is This Thing On,” will compete in the drama categories at the upcoming Golden Globe Awards, with star…
